Text: Q MTM IncomeFYI here is accountings response to the MTM Difference on Q Chris edited my roll of MTM to explain the difference we had for July close Forwarded by Chad GardnerHOUEES on AM Chris Elliott PM To Chad ES cc Cathy ES Subject Q MTM Income Chad I have attached a revised file containing a breakout of the difference between MTM Income and the change in our PRM asset balance If you have any questions please feel free to contact me at Thank you Chris Elliott

Qs PRM Cc Cathy I want to recap our conversation yesterday because after I thought about it I still do not understand the issue with Q and its PRM A credit reserve was set up for bad debts for and credited to account Prudency Reserve It is my understanding that this was the only way to book this transaction But I do not understand why this was booked in a PRM account and not booked to the Allowance for Bad Debts account Also when I reduce the account balance by the that was booked there my difference doubles to see attached spreadsheet So was account originally credited or debited by the If it was originally debited and I remove that debit then the PRM will roll Also will there be anyway to move this transaction out of the PRM accounts in order to effectively roll these accounts every month Thanks for your help Chad
